description: This file defines Flask API routes for a TicTacToe game backend, including game creation, move processing, game state retrieval, health check, and statistics endpoints. It interacts with game logic, database, and models modules.

classes.name: TicTacToeGame
classes.description: Class handling TicTacToe game logic, including move validation, making moves, and checking for winners.

classes.name: MinimaxAI
classes.description: Class implementing AI logic for TicTacToe using Minimax algorithm.

classes.name: GameStatus
classes.description: Enum representing game status states (e.g., ACTIVE, COMPLETED).

classes.name: GameOutcome
classes.description: Enum representing game outcomes (WIN, LOSS, DRAW).

methods.name: validate_difficulty
methods.description: Validates if the provided difficulty string matches allowed levels.

methods.name: validate_move_position
methods.description: Validates if the move position is an integer between 0 and 8.
